MOVE_TYPES.title: Kamehameha
MOVE_TYPES.description: An energy wave. The signature attack of the students of the Turtle School.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Special Beam Cannon
MOVE_TYPES.description: A concentrated beam attack that takes a long time to charge.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Taunt
MOVE_TYPES.description: Making a funny face and a rude noise, draws the attention of the target.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Spirit Bomb
MOVE_TYPES.description: Takes a while to charge up but then unleashes a powerful attack

MOVE_TYPES.title: Blast Barrage
MOVE_TYPES.description: Unleash a barrage of energy blasts at the opponent

MOVE_TYPES.title: Light Grenade
MOVE_TYPES.description: Fire an explosive energy ball at the target

MOVE_TYPES.title: Super Explosive Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: Attack all enemies with an explosive wave.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Tri Beam
MOVE_TYPES.description: An energy beam fired in the shape of a triangle

MOVE_TYPES.title: Solar Flare
MOVE_TYPES.description: Emit a blinding light infront of self to blind a target at close range

MOVE_TYPES.title: Evil Containment Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: attempt to capture an opponent inside of a container

MOVE_TYPES.title: Scatter Energy Wave
MOVE_TYPES.description: Fire an energy wave that surprises the enemy by splitting apart into several projectiles

MOVE_TYPES.title: Destructo-Disc
MOVE_TYPES.description: Release an energy disc capable of cutting anything at the opponent

MOVE_TYPES.title: Y-Yajirobe?!
MOVE_TYPES.description: Yajirobe springs into action attack at the most opportune, least risky time for a devastating strike.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Wolf Fang Fist
MOVE_TYPES.description: Embody a fierce wolf and unleash a barrage of strikes

MOVE_TYPES.title: Spriti Ball
MOVE_TYPES.description: An ball of energy the user has complete control over.

MOVE_TYPES.title: Neo Wolf Fang Fist
MOVE_TYPES.description: Ultimate version of wolf fang fist
